mapper.insert: INSERT BOARD(board_title, board_content, board_user_email, board_created_at, board_modified_at) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardUserEmail}, #{boardCreatedAt}, #{boardModifiedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD set board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_modified_at = #{boardModifiedAt} WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT board_seq AS boardSeq, board_title AS boardTitle, board_content AS boardContent, board_created_at As boardCreateAt, board_modified_at AS boardModifiedAt, board_user_email AS boardUserEmail FROM BOARD LIMIT #{page}, #{board_num};
